com.cyc.baseclient.subl

Interface SubLFunction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<Object>, CycObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSubLMultiArgFunction, AbstractSubLNoArgFunction, AbstractSubLSingleArgFunction, BasicSubLFunction, BoundpFunction, CategorizeTermWrtApiFunctionResource, FboundpFunction, ProbeFileFunction, SubLBooleanNoArgFunction, SubLBooleanSingleArgFunction, SubLCycListNoArgFunction, SubLCycObjectNoArgFunction, SubLCycObjectSingleArgFunction, SubLStringNoArgFunction, SubLStringSingleArgFunction

    public interface SubLFunction
extends CycObject
    A Java representation of a SubL function.

    Note that this interface does not currently define a method for evaluating the function. Because there can be a lot of variability to how particular SubL functions may be evaluated, this is left to the implementation. However, there are a number of classes which extend BasicSubLFunction to provide evaluation methods.
